elements.label: Library groundskeeper
elements.description: This one tends to the Library's gardens.

elements.label: Blessed clay
elements.description: Clay from the holy soil on which a temple was built.

elements.label: Rose from yesterday
elements.description: When you hold this rose, yesterday seems very far away.

elements.label: Miniature ivory labyrinth
elements.description: A miniature labyrinth made from ivory that resembles the garden.

elements.label: Polished bronze plate
elements.description: You can see your reflection in this, but... backwards?

elements.label: The God of the Labyrinth
elements.description: An idol depicting the Lord of Mazes.
